words.def: a relative position or degree of value in a graded group
an established ceremony prescribed by a religion
An old Portuguese money of account .
place (flax, hemp, or jute) in liquid so as to promote loosening of the fibers from the woody tissue
neckwear consisting of a long narrow piece of material worn (mostly by men) under a collar and tied in knot at the front
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
the branch of engineering that deals with the use of computers and telecommunications to retrieve and store and transmit information
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a light strong grey lustrous corrosion-resistant metallic element used in strong lightweight alloys (as for airplane parts)
